articles.title: Curiosity rover cracked open a rock and may have settled the 'life on Mars' debate - Earth.com
articles.description: Curiosity rover cracked open a Martian rock, revealing a sight never before seen on Mars - a dazzling display of yellow sulfur crystals.
articles.content: Imagine taking a leisurely Sunday drive, and you accidentally smash something on the road that turns out to be an unprecedented scientific revelation. Well, that’s exactly what happened to NASA’s Cur… [+5772 chars]

articles.title: Speed of quantum entanglement is measured, but it's too fast for humans to understand - Earth.com
articles.description: Even when particles seem to shift in the blink of an eye, as with quantum entanglement, there are measurable intervals involved.
